title: Should `:` included in the expected values

labels.name: A-diagnostics
labels.description: Area: Messages for errors, warnings, and lints

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
<!--
Thank you for filing a bug report! 🐛 Please provide a short summary of the bug,
along with any information you feel relevant to replicating the bug.

If you cannot produce a minimal reproduction case (something that would work in
isolation), please provide the steps or even link to a repository that causes
the problematic output to occur.
-->

Given the following code: <!-- Please provide a link to play.rust-lang.org -->

```rust
#[allow(dead_code)]
struct Foo<'a> {
    name: &'a str,
    age: u8,
}

fn main() {
    let _foo = Foo {
        name: "Awiteb",
        age 18,
    };
}
```

The current output is:

```
Compiling playground v0.0.1 (/playground)
error: expected one of `,` or `}`, found `18`
  --> src/main.rs:10:13
   |
8  |     let _foo = Foo {
   |                --- while parsing this struct
9  |         name: "Awiteb",
10 |         age 18,
   |             ^^ expected one of `,` or `}`

error[[E0063]](https://doc.rust-lang.org/stable/error-index.html#E0063): missing field `age` in initializer of `Foo<'_>`
 --> src/main.rs:8:16
  |
8 |     let _foo = Foo {
  |                ^^^ missing `age`

For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0063`.
```

<!-- The following is not always necessary. -->
Ideally the output should look like:

```
Compiling playground v0.0.1 (/playground)
error: expected one of `:` or `,` or `}`, found `18`
  --> src/main.rs:10:13
   |
8  |     let _foo = Foo {
   |                --- while parsing this struct
9  |         name: "Awiteb",
10 |         age 18,
   |             ^^ expected one of `:` or `,` or `}`

error[[E0063]](https://doc.rust-lang.org/stable/error-index.html#E0063): missing field `age` in initializer of `Foo<'_>`
 --> src/main.rs:8:16
  |
8 |     let _foo = Foo {
  |                ^^^ missing `age`

For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0063`.
```
`:` is not included in the expected values and I think it should be
